title: Extract Words
instructions:
You're building a simple text processor. Given a sentence, you need to extract all the individual words from it and return them as a list.

Words are separated by spaces. Sentences may end with a period, which should be ignored (not included in any word).

For example, given the sentence `"I love cake."`, you should return:

```
["I", "love", "cake"]
```

Create a function called `extract_words` that takes a sentence as its input and returns a list of the words in the sentence.
hints: Start with an empty list and an empty string for building each word
Use a for-each loop to iterate through each character in the sentence
When you hit a space, push the current word to the list (if it's not empty) and reset the word
Skip periods entirely - don't add them to the current word
Don't forget to push the last word after the loop ends
